title: Workshop-Based Instructional Design Requirements Planning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design concepts and practical experience in relevant scientific fields
context.additional_context: Collaborative Design Workshop Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners write global user requirement specifications for technology-based educational products through workshop collaboration.
Learners explain the process of systematically deriving educational requirements by collaborating with stakeholders according to the SLIM methodology.
Learners develop measurable instructional design specifications based on practical experience in science fields.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
